Dvāramandala：A village in Ceylon．When Pandukābhaya was young，he lay there in concealment and escaped various attempts on his life （Mhv.x.1； Dpv.x.9）．It was near the Cetiyapabbata，and Kundalī，friend of Dīghābhaya，lived there （Mhv.xxiii.23）．Five hundred young men from this village were ordained by Mahinda （Mhv.xvii.59）.
